Package imagingbook.common.histogram

Class HistogramPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.ImagePlus
      • imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.measure.Measurements, ImageObserver, Cloneable
    public class HistogramPlot
extends ij.ImagePlus
    Defines a simple image window to display histograms. This is a sub-class of ImagePlus (similar to ij.gui.HistogramPlot).
    Version:
    2022/09/22 revised to extend ImagePlus
